title: Teacher does huge smile for the camera after being caught having sex with pupil
text:
Picture Facebook A teacher did a huge cheesy smile for the camera – after being busted having a sexual relationship with a young pupil.
Woman's vagina left 'like it had grown teeth biting lover's penis' by op Married Sarah Fowlkes, 27, has been charged with having an improper relationship with a 17-year-old student.
Detectives were tipped off by officials at Lockhart High School, Texas.
‘Their contact was of a sexual nature,’ police said.
Schools Superintendent Susan Bohn wrote to parents saying, ‘Fowlkes will not return to the school district. The district is sending notice of the conduct to the State Board for Educator Certification.

‘Student safety is the district’s most important priority. As soon as we learned of the report, we acted swiftly to involve law enforcement and CPS to conduct a thorough investigation. The district does not and will not tolerate any improper communication or contact between a teacher and child.’
Fowlkes has reportedly been married since 2013 and celebrated her birthday at a restaurant with her husband the night before she was arrested.
She started working at Lockhart High last September, according to her page on the school’s website.
